column145: Inquire Build new knowledge by inquiring, thinking critically, identifying problems, and developing strategies for solving problems
column146: Include Demonstrate an understanding and commitment to inclusiveness and respect for diversity in the learning community
column147: Collaborate Work effectively with others to broaden perspectives and work toward common goals
column148: Curate Make meaning for oneself and others by collecting, organizing, and sharing resources of personal relevance
column149: Explore Discover and innovate in a growth mindset developed through experience and reflection
column150: Engage Demonstrate safe, legal, and ethical creating and sharing of knowledge products independently while engaging in a community of practice and in an interconnected world
column151: Think Inquire, think critically, and gain knowledge
column152: Create Draw conclusions, make informed decisions, apply knowledge to new situations, and create new knowledge
column153: Share Share knowledge and participate ethically and productively as members of our democratic society
column154: Grow Pursue personal and aesthetic growth
